name: No Face's Happy Place
description:
Hello. I'm Bao, a second year student at Howest DAE. 'No Face's Happy Place' is my environment art entry for the 2021 Rising Star contest by Grads in Games.

This environment is based of the concept of a student from the school Eart CG. The concept is https://www.artstation.com/artwork/rRvln5, please check it out! 

I worked a few hours per week over a span of 6 weeks on this project, this was a great project to test my skills on.

You can also view it on ArtStation  : https://www.artstation.com/artwork/lxKYZo
